caption: Amazing food & atmosphere! .. We received amazing service and the our food was almost beyond words.  Cannot wait to return once we can travel again!
The dirty martinis are very good from here main course we had porterhouse steak with broccoli asparagus and mashed potatoes really yummy to lick your fingers
(Translated by Google) Here for meat 🥩! ^ _ ^  (Original) 肉ならここ🥩！^_^
Best steakhouse in nyc. Family run and so nice.  Steak is just as good as peter luger and staff is soooo nice!!
Best Steakhouse in Brooklyn
Always   good

Had some great dirty martinis here and the service was amazing. They waiter gave great insight on each meal. We ordered 2 apps the bacon and the short ribs. The bacon was fair but not as good as Peter Lugers. The short ribs were basically mashed potatoes with a little bit of short rib. Love my French onion soup. I got a porter house for 2 and it was salty and very oily 2 things I hate in a steak. Temp on the steak  was perfect (Medium rare). The side were beyond lack luster, we went against the waiters suggestions and we hated the side. A solid 3 for a steakhouse but would only go back for the bar!
Ok so im having stake here right now and it’s melting in my mouth totally recommend any stake lover going here they little pricey but listen this stake is bang bang!!!

I am so happy I read everyones good reviews and took a chance going to Destefano's. We went for my mother's birthday and she loved it. The tables were more than 6feet apart beacuse of social distancing with Covid.  Everyone felt safe. The server was courteous and patient. We never felt rushed once eventhough we spent alot of time taking pictures!:) When our food finally arrived, we were in heaven!!! The food was like eating chocolate and feeling happy. We had the lamb chops, 16oz new york strip, chicken cordon bleau, mashed potatoes, and creamed corn and spinach. The drinks and cheese cake were great as well.  Overall, it was worth the money.
Awesome Food , awesome ambiance great service!
Great steak house and service is well the way she took care of our table of  6 we e only needed to  nod our heads.from dru green crew @ duck duck  bar
some food very good most mediocre considering price
This place provides first-rate service as well as tasty meals. One of my favourite spots in the area. The meals served fast and the prices are inexpensive. I recommend this place.

Beautiful decor, fantastic food, delicious drinks, polite and friendly service, a must eat place..no need to go to the City for this type of restaurant. A pure gem. A little note of advice:  be on time or at least call if you are going to be late, seating is limited with a high demand.

I love this steakhouse. The food is always perfectly cooked and extremely flavorful. Everyone who works here treats us like we are part of the family and their staff is extra attentive. We've been to many large name brand steakhouses and none of them can top this small secret gem of a steakhouse! Our favorite items on the menu include: caesar salad, porterhouse for two, mashed potatoes and string beans. Their creamed corn and bacon are also extremely delicious. For dessert, take a slice of cheesecake to go to enjoy as a snack one you're no longer stuffed.    Hands down my favorite steakhouse 💖

My daughter took me on a date tonight the food was cooked to perfection!! I ordered the lamb chops with a butter pistachio topping, Amazing!! My daughter ordered a 24oz steak, dinner was so delicious. I'll most definitely be back for the lamb chops!!
Meh! 😐

I have to say, I have had great steak in many places in New York like Sparks Steakhouse in Manhattan and at many other Italian restaurants, but DeStefano's was, by far, the best! I ordered the 8 oz filet and my brother ordered the 12 oz and both were cooked to perfection.  They were so good that we actually ordered a second 8 oz filet with a challenge to the chef to make it as good as the first two. He accepted the challenge and he won! Well, we won because we got to eat the steak. The sides were exceptional, the wine selection was great and the staff was amazing! We most definitely plan on eating at DeStefano's again and again.
Great service and food
Excellent service, what more needs to be said
The best steakhouse in brooklyn

My father came into the city and asked where we could get a decent steak. I did a quick google search and realized that DeStefano's was the place to go. I loved the simple, classic steakhouse vibe that the place exudes. The server was attentive and bright. And the steaks were medium-rare pieces of art. Cannot wait for my next visit here!

First time dining here at DeStefano’s and it exceeded my expectations. My wife and I had the crab cakes, and the 24 Oz. Rib Eye and everything was just Divine! Great service and Amazing food. Thank Michelle for taking care of us. Will definitely go back!
Amazing food, great staff! Outdoor dining has booths so you get to eat more privately :)
Food was great. Some nearby parking would be helpful.
Great host great crew great steaks

They saved a table for us after having a bad experience at another restaurant previously and there was a birthday to celebrate which they made extra special by bringing in every request the birthday girl asked for, really great service would go back there anytime
Amazing food and even better service. Highly recommend to anyone. Steaks were perfectly cooked and sides were amazing. Try the creamed corn.

Had an amazing dinner at DeStefano's. It's a cozy joint with dim lighting, but in a good way. We ordered their Steak wedges which was just the right amount of crispy but soft inside. For appetizers, we ordered their short ribs roll. Very tasty! Most importantly, Steak was perfect. Our cut was was quality. Lastly.. the wait staff was also top notch. They were constantly refilling our glasses. Will definitely be back.
Excellent!!!!
DeStefano's Steakhouse, quality of food is better than Peter Lugars.  The prices are really good.
Steaks where great. Our waiter David was fantastic.
Very over priced. Nothing special. Never to return.
Foot was wonderful, staff was very attentive. I highly recommended by this place.
Fabulous service! Food is delicious!
Great steak, actually great everything. You won't be disappointed if you eat here.

Excellent, the ambiance, the service and the food were great. We had the crab cakes,  12 oz steak, spinach & steak fries. We shared, had plenty to eat & a nice take home. We had the Big Apple drinks DELICIOUS.
Great spot - Highly Recommend

As always, 100% excellent. Great food, cooked to perfection, great staff, perfect night, start to finish. I have been here about 20 times now, and one thing you can count on is consistency, time after time.
Oh my God Michelle was great very knowledgeable about their steaks. Have to go again real soon. Go with some friends and have a great time.
First time dining here, and I must say, I love the atmosphere. Very quaint and the food was good. Would definitely dine here again.
One of my preferred places to grab some food. fantastic location, well kept, and very good service. I highly recommend them!

Ever crave a juicy & perfectly cooked steak with sides so darn good it literally makes you close your eyes and say Mmmmm? If so, then you definitely need to visit this steakhouse to satisfy that craving!! You won't be disappointed! Family owned business and wonderful service. Must visit if you're in Brooklyn, New York.
Food is good and the staff is awesome.
Great steakhouse... friendly staff great steaks!!! Definitely going back!!!
Amazing filet and outstanding sides!

Been here a couple of times and it never disappoints. Authentic and sticks to it's roots, warm and inviting feeling. Food is amazing and never lacking flavor. Steaks are the best around Brooklyn. Sides are of bigger portion then you think. I like to go with a small side when I'm with my fiance it's just perfect. Prices are perfect for what you're getting on the table and service.
Very nice, cozy neighborhood restaurant with excellent steaks!

Rib eye  was really good but it came in a huge puddle of butter oil.  I didn’t bother to say anything to the waitress because I figured they should have some common sense which is clearly not so common.  Otherwise, the cream corn and garlic mash potatoes were pretty good and the service was excellent.
New York Strip!
Best steaks!!

Porterhouse steak is just amazing and juicy! It’s crispy but really moist inside!! All the staffs in this restaurant are super kind and friendly. And Love atmosphere so much!!! Wanna visit Dstefano’s Steakhouse again! Best nyc steak house!!!
Landmark
Porterhouse was perfectly made!!!
Great service and extremely TASTY meal. I highly recommend this place for a nice meal.

Will sum this up by saying grace & joy were the highlights of our experience. Actually with a capital G & J. Our two fantastic servers filled the room with their namesakes. We celebrated the last single night for our bestie who got married the next day and every request was delivered with aplomb and their attention to detail was second to none. We had the section to ourselves and were able to literally LOL without disturbing the revelers in the main dining room. All of the meal choices were flavorful, perfectly prepared and  #deeeelish!!! Absolutely one of the best lamb chops I've ever had. Pistachio encrusted lamb chops were fan-friggen-tastic!!! My friends had NY Strip steaks and cleaned their plates. We shared shrimp cocktail, the short rib appetizer in a pastry shell & crab cakes. The small sides feed two, the medium 3 to 4 and the large will serve a village. 🤭  Highly recommend DeStefano's. I had to take an Uber to the LIRR, then catch the 7 & G trains and walked in the rain for a couple of blocks to get there. It was worth it! #LocalGem #GreatEats #LambTastic #Steakhouse #RecoveringKnowItAll
Its OK. I wouldn't go second time. Very old school ,old decor and semi expensive for what it offers. Do not go by internet Manu prices as the ones on actual manu are way higher
No steak knife is required, ha! Shadowed by Peter Luger's since the beginning, yet it has survived and stay as a local go-to spot with fine quality!
Great service & delicious food!

Absolutely amazing experience. The food is delicious. The staff is so hospitable. Our server Michelle was wonderful. They even supplied my one year old with table toys. Me and my family will most definitely be returning.
Loved it! Must try it. The Steak was Wonderful.  The sides dishes were really good too. Crab cake appitizer is excellent.
Simply perfect every time. Order the 40oz porter house. Thank me later. And thick cut bacon. And mashed. Unreal. Great atmosphere too.
Great steak and excellent service. Im a buisness owner of IN THE CUT barbershop on Humboldt st
Great steaks. One of best in NY
Food was delicious
The steak was to die for..

Amazing food!!!! Its a bit pricey so if your not trying to spend at least $60 and up a plate than this isnt the place you want, but if your looking for amazing steak and great service this is your place.
(Translated by Google) It was very crowded like this review and it was delicious and the atmosphere was very happy. The price was cheap.  (Original) 아래 리뷰처럼 적당히 붐비고 맛있고 분위기 좋아요 정말 행복한 시간이였어요 가격도 싸구요
Favorite steakhouse period !!!! Everything is good here.
Excellent steak.  cream spinach the best very cozy atmosphere . Excellent service I would highly recommend this restaurant.
Absolutely amazing   Very comfortable decor. Great staff.  Porterhouse is outrageously good.  Lobster Ravioli is incredible.  One of the best meals you'll ever have
I feel like I'm in The Sopranos at this place.  Best steak I've had since Peter Luger!
Food was awesome.   Service was great.  Great outing.
I hadn't ate beef in like 6 months but when I was in new York . i went here an had one hell of a steak with some old friends.
We had an awesome  in this spot. We liked the extraordinary atmosphere and the meals. The waiters are super affable. I’m content we finally decided to eat here.

Love this place!  Was recommended to us. Very cozy, casual family restaurant. I had the lamb chops and my huband had the filet.  So good!  Our waitress was so very friendly and service was awesome. The sides, are for 2 if you order small.  Well worth the price, will go again when visiting.
Love my garlic mash, best crab cakes so far (aside from going to Baltimore). Great for a cozy dinner!
Can not beat destefanos. I have been to all the big name steak houses around NYC and this remains my favorite. By far... go here you will not regret it.
I constantly come purchasing some food in this place. I love the swift customer service and well prepared dishes. I recommend this place.
The food and service were above my expectations. I truly loved the environment of this place. Great spot to take my family out for dinner.
One of the best steaks out there. Easily up with the best.
Highly recommand, the meat was amazing and perfectly cooked. We followed the waiter s suggestion and were really happy with it. Nice atmosphere, friendly staff and good Italian wine
The food is utterly delicious I only wish I could give them a 10 star rate
Love my waitress grace, the steak was great and service even greater...
Certainly a place worth trying, the food is excellent and well prepared, the prices are affordable and it is constantly clean in here. Highly recommended.
Neighborhood family Restaurant with a personal touch...you will not be disappointed...you will enjoy a great dinner & you will not go broke...mangia!
I live b recommend this place . Atmosphere is awesome , foods delicious n service on point . I love this beautiful n family oriented steakhouse . M a frequent visitor  .
Truly delicious...... put it this way...... I cut the steak with the butter knife.... Couldn't do that at Lugers ! Proud to say I was born n raised in the Burg.

Excellent steaks. As good as you can get at any other famous steakhouse in NYC. Sides are good too. Good service and pretty good ambiance. 5 stars for the steaks. Just as good as Peter Luger's if not better.
I always come grabbing some food in here. I enjoy the rapid service and well prepared food. Highly recommended.
Amazing food and even better service. Highly recommend to anyone. Steaks were perfectly cooked and sides were amazing. Try the creamed corn.
Food was delicious,  staff very friendly and answered any questions . They celebrated my birthday with birthday cake
They serve large portions and for fair rates. kind employees. They never disappoint.
Better than Peter Lugers
Great food. Waitress very nice and caring.
(Translated by Google) Excellent grilled meat  (Original) Excelente carne a la parrilla

Destefano's is a very nice steakhouse with a cozy interior. DeStefano's has a variety of different types of steak's to choose from, nice bottles of wine, great sides, and a cozy inside that makes it warming. I would recommend a try at the steakhouse
excellent steaks, appetizers and desserts.  Very pricey.
This spot is worth a try. They serve large portions for affordable rates. Constantly neat and with fantastic ambience. Would recommend to others.
Great service, delicious meal loved their beet salad, potato croquets, steak so tender you didn't need a steak knife to cut

Been to Destefano's a few times now. The staff are always accommodating and patient. Food is great and the atmosphere is perfect for either a family get together, chilling with friends, or taking that special someone out for a lovely time. Highly recommended!

(Translated by Google) Family atmosphere. Friendly service ~ Peter Ruger I went to the review and chose it. The price is rather cheap. Services Baguette bread, porterhouse, filet mignon, cream cone, etc. All delicious, filet mignon is not really flavorful here, it was really delicious! I want to go again !!  We failed to walk in peter luger and chose this restaurant based on a random article about brooklyns best steakhouses. We were very happy with our stay. Porterhouse was perfectly juicy and flavorfully buttery. Filet minon was just super !! Creamed corn was soooo good. Crispy spicy bacon was great! The Pear salad was awesomely fresh and sweet. Chocolate covered icecream was good. French onion soup was not too salty but tasty (american fos is often too salty). One of us was Peter lugers big fan but he also enjoyed very much stef! The article was wrong- This place would be one of the best in all nyc. The tiramisu was okay; It was more like a firm cake.  (Original) 가정적 분위기. 친절한 서비스~ 피터루거 못가서 리뷰보고 선택했는데 피터루거 왕팬인 일행도 인정했네요. 가격은 오히려 저렴한 편이고요. 서비스바게트빵부터 포터하우스, 필레미뇽, 크림콘 등 다 맛있었고 필레미뇽 맛없는곳은 진짜풍미없는데 여기 정말 맛있었어요! 또 가고 싶은 곳!!  We failed to walk in peter luger and chose this restaurant based on a random article about brooklyns best steakhouses. We very much loved its home-like atmosphere, hospitality and Foooood! Porterhouse was perfectly juicy and flavorfully buttery. Filet minon was just super!! Creamed corn was soooo good. Crispy spicy bacon was great! Pear salad was awesomely fresh and sweet. Chocolate covered icecream was good. French onion soup wasnt too salty but tasty (american fos is often too salty). One of us was Peter lugers big fan but he also very much enjoyed destefanos steak! The article was wrong- This place would be one of the best in all nyc. Tiramisu was okay; it was more like a firm cake w less moist.
Great food, lovely service!
This place has a really homey and understated feel but don't be fooled you will have a truly spectacular meal.
P The food was phenomenal. I had the lamb it was seasoned to perfection and melted in my mouth!! The customer service was awesome!

If I could give this restaurant & its employees 20 stars I would. Being a Williamsburg native, and having grown up my whole life on Leonard Street about 100 feet from this restaurant is a bonus to go back home and see just a little bit of familiarity in the neighborhood I barely recognize anymore. The food in this place is beyond perfection! The crab cakes & short rib rolls are to die for! ANY entree ordered is cooked to perfection & their sides are fresh, hot & delicious!!! We will keep going back to Bklyn all the time just to eat here! The staff & the owner are so attentive, you cannot ask for better!!!

Great steak in a cozy homelike setting. Unlike most restaurants in the area, this place is rooted in the older Italian Williamsburg neighborhood. It's a great place to take your family, or go on a fancy date. The prices aren't inexpensive, but match the quality of the food, and offer larger portions than other nearby steakhouses charging the same or higher prices.

What an amazing experience we had at this Steakhouse, we are all so glad to have chosen DeStefano's during our stay in New York! The staff, The Food & The Restaurant made us feel like we were apart of the family. Thank You again. See you on the next trip to the Big Apple!
A great menu I found a little overpriced but very good
Excellence, the party was loved every bite . The dessert made the dinner that much better.
It was amazing, the food was great and the service was next level! I would recommend this place to anyone who loves a great meal and kind people!
The nice place for eating

Mediocre to say the least. Crab cakes had an after taste as if they were frozen a long time.  They were also luke warm. Which was really strange. The steak was ok. Nothing amazing. Waiter was very nice. The space was very spacious. Very homie. Lots of old photos.
Fabulous food, impeccable service. The rib eye was so tender and melts like butter. I also loved the salad with roasted pears. Thanks for a great dining experience.
Yummy
Nice place, very good food, fresh and delicious!
Addicting. Awesome. Amazing AAA
Really great steak. Family owned and operated. The owner even greeted us and gave us desert on the house. Excellent food.
Atmosphere is nice. Staff is very friendly and know their menu. Steak was good, not great.
Amazing staff. Amazing food.

Great location, lots of parking, cozy atmosphere. This is my go to place when I want to enjoy great steak in an intimate setting. I’ve dined here several times and it’s always been such a great experience. The food is delicious, the staff members are extremely nice, and the ambience is always perfect. It’s perfect for families and couples. I highly recommend this place for steak lovers looking to have a nice dinner in a comfy setting. Totally worth the money!!
Best lamb chops in NYC
Old school and amazing
Excellent food, excellent service and beautiful atmosphere! I've been in a different steakhouses but this one is Must!
Have eaten there twice over the last few years and never disappointed. Steak was perfectly cooked and tender and service was excellent! I will keep coming back.
(Translated by Google) Best steakhouse! Recommended :)  (Original) Bestes steakhouse! Empfehlenswert :)
Best steakhouse ever, my favorite restaurant!
Incredible steaks! If you’re looking for gimmicks and frills then this place isn’t for you. If you want an old school vibe, premium beef and delicious martinis... look no further.

Absolutely amazing experience. The food is delicious. The staff is so hospitable. Our server Michelle was wonderful. They even supplied my one year old with table toys. Me and my family will most definitely be returning.
Cozy atmosphere, friendly staff. The food was amazing!!! Appetizers and dinner were absolutely delicious!!!! Definitely going back.  Highly recommend!!!

Over from England for my sons 21st. Wanted to get out of the commercial bits of NYC, so saw good reviews and went here. Wow! Excellent place. Easily the best meal we had all week. Best service and staff in NYC! Highly recommended! I mentioned it was my sons 21st and they gave us a free dessert! If you're in ny, go to Williamsburg (it's also great) and have a meal here. Don't believe any bad reviews. Well done. Keep up the good work! 😊😊👍🏽👍🏽
Delicious souce

(Translated by Google) The best meal I have ever eaten in my life !! We were looking for a steakhouse in New York a little out of Manathan to avoid falling into a tourist trap. I think I found the best steakhouse in NY 😍 Level budget, it's not cheap but it's worth it. Even the dessert was good! The waiters are very friendly and helpful. Go there with your eyes closed  (Original) Le meilleur repas que je n'ai jamais mangé de ma vie !! On cherchait un steakhouse a New-York un peu excentré de Manathan pour éviter de tomber dans un piège à touristes. Je pense avoir trouvé le meilleur steakhouse de NY 😍 Niveau budget, ce n'est pas donné mais ça vaut tellement le coup. Même le dessert était bon ! Les serveurs sont très aimables et serviables. Allez y les yeux fermés
Great steaks
Food good but more expensive than  Peter Luger
My new favorite place
A bit over hyped
The best Porterhouse we have ever had
My partner and I went here for our Anniversary, their steak is really good and they have a cozy atmosphere inside!
This place is relatively close to Peter lugers and I enjoyed it just as much if not more! accessible! Still pricey but you get what you pay for.

DeStefano’s is one of the best steakhouses in Brooklyn. The owner Joe is terrific and the staff is too. You really feel like you’re at home inside. The porter house for two and the prime rib is incredible every time. So good that they don’t even give you steak knives here! The quality of the meat is so good that you don’t need them! The creamed corn is probably my favorite appetizer as well. Can’t go wrong at DeStefano’s. The brunch here is amazing too. I often find myself at the front bar hanging with Michelle and sipping on a Bloody Mary. If you haven’t been, this place is a must!
Great food. Great service!!!
Everything was great! The steaks were cooked perfectly and the waitress was great. She never rushed us and was helpful when ordering.

Came here before about 1 year ago with my wife and I recalled it being good and on par with other top steakhouses. I Came here today and I was very disappointed.  We got a ribey and a porter house for two  . The steak did not look aged at all , hard to cut , no flavor and filled with oil. Hopefully this was just a bad day and they get whoever chef or manager they had before.
My go to steak house... Never disappoints
Awesome! From the staff to the food-amazing!
Came here with friends on a Saturday and had pretty good steaks. A few months later, took my parents on a Friday at 6pm. My dad, my brother and I all got sick. Very inconsistent in my experience.
Great food great steak, better than any other steak house I know... Including Lugers!!!
Best steakhouse in Brooklyn.

My boyfriend and I came here since Peter's was booked and it was the best decision made. Best.Bacon.Ever. & the steak was absolutely delicious! Mashed Potatoes on point and the staff members were so wonderful. Safe to say we'll be a regular customer!

Wow, what an amazing steakhouse! We had such a great dinner here. The steak was cooked perfectly and was absolutely delicious. I loved the crab cakes the most. I highly recommend this appetizer, it's the best crab cake I ever had. The service was also really good. We didn't make reservations but they were able to seat us quickly.

This place is perfect for a nice date night, especially if one doesn't feel like going all the way into Manhattan for a good steak. The service is amazing, and the family-style atmosphere (have yet to actually see a kid there but I'm sure they're welcome, we've only been three times) is so welcoming and friendly. Dave is an amazing server, and make sure to try the creamed corn with parmesan.
An essential Brooklyn restaurant, steak was salty, but in a good way. Definitely on the NYC steak house circuit.
My filet was perfection.  Highly recommend.
Best stake house, recommend to all!
(Translated by Google) Very worthy  (Original) Очень достойно
Destefano's never fails. Great choices of side dishes and perfect meat
Nice atmosphere good food
Best Steakhouse PERIOD!
Food is on point

Had an amazing dinner at DeStefano's. It's a cozy joint with dim lighting, but in a good way. We ordered their Steak wedges which was just the right amount of crispy but soft inside. For appetizers, we ordered their short ribs roll. Very tasty! Most importantly, Steak was perfect. Our cut was was quality. Lastly.. the wait staff was also top notch. They were constantly refilling our glasses. Will definitely be back.
Food and staff is amazing
Excellent steakhouse. Better than Peter Luger.

Went around 9 on a Saturday and was seated right away. There were a few other tables of people. The place is just old school cool. My friend and I could talk easily without echoing off the walls or overhearing everyone else. The waiter was attentive but not obnoxious, and the porterhouse was one of the best steaks I’ve ever had. The sides were awesome, too, and my old fashioned beverage was on point. I can’t wait to go back!
Love it!

We really enjoyed this old-fashioned (though not especially old) Williamsburg steakhouse. The service was very friendly, and the steak (we ordered the porterhouse for two) was quite good. What really stood out, however, were the pistachio-crusted lamb chops, a surprise winner in the "what was your favorite dish?" competition, and the now-ubiquitous, but here-definitely-worth-ordering short rib spring rolls. More than worth a visit.
What a great place and service.
Wow...... just wow
This place was terrific.  Food was excellent

My wife decided to take me here for my birthday knowing I loved a good steak.  Let me just start by saying the steaks are indeed good, beyond good. The porterhouse for 2 is a great option for any 2 diners so you can try the filet and strip. Both were butter knife tender and seasoned extremely well. The bone in rib eye is a great choice for those into a fattier steak. But my heart is still with the strip.  For sides, we had the garlic mashed potatoes, creamed corn, creamed spinach, both of the fries. All of the sides heavenly, just go with the small.  Going backwards to the appetizers, I loved the crab cakes and grilled portobello mushroom. The short rib spring rolls were great but I think more beef and less mash would’ve been better. I was afraid I would get too full before the journey of meat ahead.

The location was cozy. There is no parking so you might have to park a few blocks away. The service is fast, fun and friendly. The food comes out fast and hot. Now for the break down.  Appetizers was good. The bacon was hickory sweet and thick. The  crab cakes was lumped to perfection. The Cesar salad was on point.  The porterhouse for 2 was good as hell. Seasoned well. I recommend medium. The rib eye was juicy and nicely seasoned to the bone.  The sides. Mash is buttery and garlic heaven. Corn was so so. Spinach dip.... not enough portion.  Drinks was good. Wine selection was good and beer could use more.  Overall solid 4/5*
(Translated by Google) The best steak ever eaten since birth  (Original) 出生以來吃過最好吃的牛排
Wow what a fantastic find. Their bacon app.blows away luger's. The steaks were amazing.
Very nice and friendly family restaurant. Service was excellent.
Delicious food, great staff

Came in with no reservation hoping to get a table, after a brief wait, we were told someone had cancelled and to follow the hosts. Perfect! Ambiance was amazing, and I think we got lucky because the whole place was fool. We got the stake for two 40oz, it was amazing! Along with Cesar sale, and some crab cakes. % stars overall would recommend for to anyone1
5 stars. All the food we got was delicious - the bacon, wedge salad and alot of sides. The 40 oz porterhouse was the best Ive had 👍
Nice cozy spot
Amazing, my cousin booked the backroom for my stag party dinner. The steak we ordered was some of the best I have ever had. I will definitely be back to DeStefanos 😀
When you go to a Steakhouse & they give you a BUTTER KNIFE to cut your steak...and its all you need!!! You know its tender!
We were staying in the city and an Uber driver recommended this place. ABSOLUTELY worth the trip from the city! Steak was amazing!
Amazing food for its price
good home cooked food
Amazing food. Relatively pricey, but worth every penny I think.
Love the fine dining look and feel along with the history of the place.

I've been to most of the well known steakhouses in the city and this is by far my favorite. The NY Strip here is my favorite steak in the world. Also great service,  great place to celebrate any special occasion.

Googled best Steak houses, this came up   read reviews and made my reservation. Came here to celebrate my 11th Yr anniversary with my wife.  From the moment entering the  place,  old school vibe and staff very welcoming. Michelle was our waitress. She was excellent. She helped my wife and I with the menu and suggest  things on the menu based on our Appetite.  The food was amazing from the appetizer to the dessert.  Started with the tomato, basil, and stuffed mozzerella. It was so good, sorry no picture that's how fast we ate it.  Main dish we both ordered the 160z NY Strip medium rare. So tender and mouth watering. Cut it with a "Butter Knife". Our side was the Garlic mashed Potatoes. Let me not even get started with this. I love mash and I could eat that  every day. Creamy smooth not overpowering with garlic.  For last we had the mousse trilogy. Fantastic it was. I ate more of it I did not want share it. I highly recommend this place  great food and amazing staff.
Top-notch, friendly service!! Delicious food and a great atmosphere!
Oh my god. I just died and went to steak heaven...
Better than Peter Luger's. The steaks are fabulous,the service is friendly and courteous. Unlike P Luger's which always seems condescending and sarcastic.
Really good food, great service. 12oz filet was cooked to perfection. Great crab cakes. Must try at least one slice of bacon. Save room for dessert.
Absolutely wonderful. Great food & service.
Lived in nyc all my life been to most of the steak houses by far best steak I ever had. No steak knives only a butter knife because it cut like butter
Calm setting, Everything was so good and the staff are really nice and attentive 👍🏾😋

The staff was friendly and the food was awesome. Very nice atmosphere. The steak is the star of the show.
Outstanding service, awesome food, my go to spot!

It's an "okay" steak house.

Amazing food, great service. What more could you want? I got the filet mignon and the garlic mashed potatoes, which were delicious. Their desserts are amazing too. They have a cheesecake with a creme brulee as a crust that's to die for.
I had the strip. Easily one of the best steaks I have had in my entire life and I don't say that lightly.
So Damn Good!! The filet was one of the best I've ever tasted.

Had the great pleasure of eating at Destefano's with my wife and 2 friends. It is a small steakhouse, and I love it like that. From the moment we stepped in, it was a great experience. The bartender at the small bar by the front door was very friendly and funny. She made great drinks and would join us in conversation when she wasn't otherwise occupied. The food was absolutely delicious.  I ordered the 24oz rib eye medium rare, it was cooked perfectly. My wife got the filet, the seasoning was amazing and it was also cooked to a perfect med rare. They were both even better the next morning with eggs. Mmmm, I'm drooling just thinking about it. The server was funny as well and took a selfie with us after our group picture. We will definitely be returning very soon.
Atmosphere, Service, Quality Food... what else can you ask for? Good stuff!
This place was absolutely wonderful. The steak was great, the service and price was also great. will definitely be returning.
I love this place, love the owners and friendly and helpful staff. I recommended this place to everyone I know.

DeStefano's is my husband and my go-to place for every special occasion. The entire staff is courteous and kind, and Michelle's service on our last visit on my birthday was the absolute best. Then, there's the food. I ordered the burrata appetizer and the NY Strip, and my husband stuck with his filet mignon. Everything was cooked to perfection and absolutely delicious. A perfect dining experience. Thanks, DeStefano's for another memorable evening!
Amazing, just Amazing.
first time in this place amazing food the steak was delicious dave  was amazing person i will come back thank u

An excellent place! Great and cozy environment, friendly and welcoming staff, and the food... Ohhh the food is delicious! The steaks are so greatly prepared, that you don't need a steak knife... It's like cutting butter! An excellent place, that would definitely visit again
Great food and service. Been coming here for years. They make you feel like part of the family
love d food

Very nice

They never even bothered giving me a steak knife because the butter knife sliced through this amazing cut like it was ummm butter! Definitely one of the top steaks I have ever had in my life. I need to get back again sometime soon!

There is literally no other place we will eat steak.  DeStefano's is not only full of delicious food, but also amazingly friendly service. Our waiter David always remembers us when we go (and that's only once a year usually). It's the little things that count. The food is perfectly cooked and seasoned and never needs anything else. The side dishes are perfect compliments to the cuts of meats you order. I HIGHLY recommend going!
One of the best Rib Eye Steaks I ever had.
Great cozy restaurant.
The Best!
Best steak
By the end of my porterhouse I was gnawing on the bone like a God damn savage. It was phenomenal

a great place to have weekend brunch. food is good and well portioned. staffs are warm and attentive. i will come back for dinner steak.
Love their brunch!

Top 5 best steak I've ever had. Bone-In Ribeye. Do it.

Had brunch here and it was amazing, fetid skit staff that catered to my family

Amazing staff, Jonh the owner/ manager very nice and accommodating... Servers David and Jill and all are great... Place feels like home... A bit pricey but a great steak house, better than Peter lugars A+++

2018.04 ordered only De Stefano crab cake and 40 oz Porter house... Crab cake is great Abt a large scallop size and full of crab meat taste fresh.... And Porter house is fabulous.   Perfect aged and medium rare.. Usually medium rare came out medium at other restaurants.   Tender and juicy.  Not as dry as other aged steak restaurant... Service are excellent... Environment is warm..coz u will see lot of owner family pic

Excellent steaks, friendly service and cozy dining room. I have been going to DeStefano's Steakhouse for about 5 years and I've only had great experiences. I highly recommend it.

(Translated by Google) De stefano ’s Steak House [Comment 4] A casual steakhouse in Brooklyn. Lunch time is very vacant and recommended. [Atmosphere 4] It's about 20% cheaper than a high-class steakhouse and the atmosphere is casual. [Cooking 4] Very delicious Porterhouse steak is seasoned with olive oil, salt and a large amount of pepper. It has almost no aging. [Cost performance 4] It was about 20% cheaper than a high-class steakhouse, and the lunch menu and side menu were very reasonable and homely. [Customer service 5] The crisp woman at the reception was kind and polite and very pleasant.  (Original) De stefano’s Steak House 【感想4】 ブルックリンにあるカジュアルなステーキハウス。ランチタイムは非常に空いておりおすすめです。 【雰囲気4】 高級ステーキハウスに比べると2割ほど安く、雰囲気もカジュアルです。 【料理4】 とても美味しいポーターハウスステーキは、オリーブオイル、塩と大量の胡椒でしっかりとした味付け。熟成はほぼしてない味わいです。 【コストパフォーマンス4】 高級ステーキハウスに比べて2割ほど安く、ランチメニューやサイドメニューは非常にリーズナブルで家庭的でした。 【接客5】 受付のきびきびした女性は親切丁寧で、非常に気持ちの良い人でした。
Steaks are the best in lower manhattan
Good steak house.
Such a hidden gem. Small family style with the best steak in NYC.
WOW WOW WOW.  Right up there with Peter Luger. Love this place. Outstanding crab meat cocktail. Potato croquets are awesome. Staff is great. Service is great. And believe me, I am very critical.
There is aproblem with the steaks and the servise- very poor
Great service and good food.
Amazing. That's all I'm saying you need to go and find out for yourself. Trust me you will not be disappointed.

It’s not a 5 star restaurant. It’s a 6 star restaurant. The king of steakhouses in the NYC area with some sinful savory menu choices, friendliest staff and a decor that lets you feel right at home cannot be matched. Best steakhouse I have tried in town hands down.
Food is amazing

Went there for the first time and completely loved it!! The food was fantastic and our server Michelle was terrific!!.. it was totally worth the long drive it took to get there!! Thank you for the birthday drink!!
Everything is wonderful here. We love our waitress Michelle. She is very pleasant. We’ll definitely come back here again and with our friends.
Meat is good. Don’t come if you like dessert. Ambient is just gross. Glasses of wine terrible. Overall conclusion: absolutely overpriced
Absolutely delicious steak and the wait staff was exceptional
Amazing steaks!!! Just.... No other words to describe this place....Amazing food amazing staff just an overall wonderful dining experience
Awesome!
The best steaks around! Cooked to perfection! No steak knife needed here! Highly recommend!! Appetizers are amazing!!
Great food! Great service!!!

The food was beyond amazing. The rib eye steak and filet were so tender and it just melted in your mouth. The crumbulue cheesecake was one of the best cheesecakes I've ever had - so good! Our server, Michelle, made the atmosphere very comforting and she was helpful with choosing what to order. I will definitely be coming here again!

This is my second time coming here for dinner in the last week. I’ve had the Porterhouse and Rib-Eye, both of which were two of the best steaks I’ve had in Brooklyn. Aside from the food, the service here is what mostly sticks out. Our server and the owner John were very welcoming and gave us tremendous service throughout the night.
Been here several times now, have never had a bad meal. Everything is good here and they even have non-meat options if you're vegetarian or pescetarian. 2 thumbs up!!
We've been here a few times. The food and service are excellent and consistent.  Steaks are perfect. So tender you can cut them with a butter knife. The pear arugula house salad is yummy.
The best steakhouse
This place was great.  Small friendly place with amazing food.  They knew exactly how to cook a steak to preference. Ambiance was great and staff was attentive.  I would definitely come back here.
Wonderful dining experience with the friendliest staff and everything was cooked perfectly. Cozy family atmosphere makes this a great place to bring family and friends.
Nice food 😘
Great restaurant awesome vibe.
Steak was pretty good
Great prime rib! Very comfortable atmosphere. A bit pricy.

Service is great steak was so buttery you don't get a steak knife to cut u cut with a butter knife drinks were good at the end of the meal it  is expensive for a neighborhood place but as they say u get what you pay for

We came for dinner after an Islander game. It was a 10 minute cab ride over. They were very nice and sat us late at 10:30pm.( we called in advance). The staff was very friendly and helpful with ordering. They initially told us they were just as good as Peter Lugars and they do not hand out steak knives as the steak is so tender. That was a bold statement to some serious meat eaters. I have to say they nailed it on all fronts. We had a porterhouse for two medium rare and it was fantastic. No steak knife needed. Wine choices were great and it was a great meal all around. We are so happy we tried this place. It’s now on the list for pre or post game meals.
We've been coming here for special occasions for years now, and it's always delicious. Staff remembers us and it's always a fantastic experience.
Really good place
Amazing meal. Loved the porterhouse for 2 and all the side dishes. They surprised us with dessert for our anniversary. It was delicious and the perfect cherry on top to the night!
Great customer service
Awesome, no pretension, just great steaks.

Went here for me and my boyfriend's anniversary and they didn't disappoint!  We had a fairly early dinner (around 6/7) so there weren't that many people there yet.  We had the pulled pork egg rolls, the crab cakes, the brussel sprouts with bacon and a 28 day steak seasoned with fennel (I can't for the life of me remember what cut it was).  The whole evening was very nice.  They even gave us a complimentary shot of limoncello at the end.  We had also gone there with a coupon, which made a surprisingly affordable anniversary dinner for two.
Excellent place. Quiet. No long waits.  Steaks are fabulous.

This is a nice steakhouse in Williamsburg. The prices aren't cheap but good steak is never cheap. Overall, the food was great and the restaurant has a great vibe and good crowd. Also worth noting are the subtle tributes to the family-run business.

Couldn't of had a better dinner. First off the people at Dee's know how to welcome you. You get the feeling that you have walked into a large family of friends. This atmosphere stays throughout the entire meal. Then the food. It was excellent. I had the veal chop, out of this world, lots of great flavor. The menu says it's becoming the most popular and I see why. My son had the lamb chops which of course I had to try and everyone else did too at the table. Again outstanding. My wife and my son's girlfriend had the filet. Perfect. We mentioned that it was our 29th wedding anniversary the other day, so what did they do, brought over a cheese cake with a candle.  Definitely coming back when we visit our son again in Brooklyn.

I came from the UK and stumbled across this place. Went in to reserve a table the staff were excellent. Very welcoming but the food was amazing. My daughter and I were mightily impressed. Next time I'm in New York you better keep me some food as I'm coming.

Service is top notch. They even have us an appetizer on the house.  Food was excellent I had a bacon which was extremely delicious that I want to see if I can replicate it at home. My entire was lobster ravioli which I recommend to those who don't eat red meat. I know, you're thinking why would someone who doesn't eat red meat go to a steakhouse. But they do serve other food besides beef.  There's chicken, fish and ravioli. Their creamed corn, mashed potato and fries were all very good too! I came with my two young toddlers and they were very accommodating. It's not one of those restaurants where it would be rude if there were loud noises.  Definitely recommend this restaurant for any occasion.
Great steakhouse! Service is good but quite slow. Meat juicy and tasty... unfortunately the knives are not sharp at all, must be replaced!
The service was spectacular but I wasn't overly impressed with my steak.
The steak was so juicy and teander the service was great highly recommend this steak house it's worth the money
Joy is awesome. Great esspresso Martini
Off the charts
So noisy we could not stay.

VERY disappointed. My girlfriend and I were the first patrons at this restaurant on a Saturday morning. When we sat down a few more couples came in and sat down as well. We ordered the special for the day which was a burrata with heirloom tomatoes and it was good. For the entree we decided to split the 40 oz porterhouse since that is what most people try here (based on reviews). We ordered it Medium rare as per recommendation from the server.  When we got the steak it was so raw and chewy I was shocked. How can a $95 steak be cooked so poorly? It was COLD in the middle and it was so chewy I thought I would get TMJ from the amount of chewing I did. I asked the server to please have the chef cook it some more. When they brought it back IT WAS STILL RARE!!!!!! And then the server started giving me dirty looks and laughing with her coworker. I came to a steakhouse that servers over priced steaks. I EXPECT them to be flawless!!!!!  I'm really a non confrontational person so I just wanted to get the hell out of there. I asked for the steak to be doggy bagged and we left. And get this.... Right before we leave a couple that came in AFTER us, LEFT before us after they complained that their steaks were chewy and dry. We were not the only ones disappointed that day. The service could have been better as well, if you are a server and you can see your patrons are clearly dissatisfied with the meal.. SAY SOMETHING! Correct the problem and don't bring back the SAME problem!!  Folks, if you want a real quality dry-aged steak with REAL NYC service. I strongly suggest Wolfgangs!!!! They will come to you and FINISH the steak off right on the ceramic plate it comes in so it's nice and hot.  I will NEVER come back here!!!!
